sentences: Tüdruk jõudis oma kandamiga kohale, ise hingpakkis ja üleni higine.
Ta jooksis kiiresti, et jõuda õigel ajal.
context: The word 'jooksed' is the plural form of 'jooksma', which means to run in Estonian. In this context, it appears to be used with 'hingpakkis' (breathless) to describe someone running very fast or sprinting, likely out of breath due to the speed of their movement.
